lead_paragraph: Florida A&M fired men’s basketball coach Mike Gillespie Sr. yesterday after six seasons, less than three months after he was charged with misdemeanor stalking. Gillespie has been on administrative leave with pay since late May and will continue to be paid through Nov. 2.
